verses.verse: See how good <WH2896> and how pleasant <WH5273> it is for brothers <WH251> to live <WH3427> together <WH3162> in unity! <WH3162>

It is like the precious <WH2896> oil <WH8081> on the head, <WH7218> that ran down <WH3381> on the beard, <WH2206> even Aaron <WH175>'s beard; <WH2206> that came down <WH3381> on the edge <WH6310> of his robes; <WH4060>

like the dew <WH2919> of Hermon, <WH2768> that comes down <WH3381> on the hills <WH2042> of Zion: <WH6726> for there Yahweh <WH3068> gives <WH6680> the blessing, <WH1293> even life <WH2416> forevermore. <WH5769>
